view.craft

Class CraftWindowImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.WindowAbstract
      • view.craft.CraftWindowImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CraftWindow, Window

    public final class CraftWindowImpl
extends WindowAbstract
implements CraftWindow
    An implementation of CraftWindow. It is composed by a CraftGrid, a CraftSelection and a CraftOptions object each with specific responsibilities.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CraftWindowImpl(View owner)
      Creates a new instance with an empty grid.
